title: [SOLVED]Keyboard and trackpad issue A1502
message:
Macbook with no working trackpad or keyboard.  Did a battery unplug and all is working fine. Next day, again, not working.  Any ideas? No clue on where to start if its working.
I've seen the IC in one once with a cracked IC and changed it and all was good. But this is kinda strange.

title: [SOLVED]Keyboard and trackpad issue A1502
message: force touch trackpad? If yes then the cable is bad.

title: [SOLVED]Keyboard and trackpad issue A1502

title: [SOLVED]Keyboard and trackpad issue A1502
message: This did work.  I was going nuts on where to start.  Thank you !
